author: Devan McGuinness
title: Manny Gutierrez‚Äôs dad wrote the most epic letter in support of his son after a conservative blogger shamed him
text:
Manny Gutierrez‚Äôs dad wrote the most epic letter in support of his son after a conservative blogger shamed him We have been big fans of Manny Gutierrez ~ aka Manny MUA ~ for a long time and when we heard the news that he was named the first-ever male makeup ambassador for Maybelline cosmetics , we jumped for joy. He is one of our go-to gurus when we‚Äôre stuck for a fierce makeup look and he never disappoints. His talent and confidence is oozing and when his father wrote a letter is support of Manny MUA after he was shamed on Twitter , we fell in love with his dad, too.
Tweets flooded in to Manny MUAs account in support of his new position as an ambassador for one of the big makeup companies, but of course, conservative blogger, Matt Walsh, had to insert his input, which we feel was completely uncalled for.
Dads, this is why you need to be there to raise your sons. pic.twitter.com/8ybirgppKi 
‚Äî Matt Walsh (@MattWalshBlog) January 6, 2017 His fans jumped on that tweet, telling Wash that he was out of line.
Manny stood up for himself, too, sharing his reply to Walsh on Instagram replying that his dad IS proud of him, and all that‚Äôs he‚Äôs accomplished, and that his dad works for his company. You can have a seat 
A photo posted by Manny Gutierrez (@mannymua733) on Jan 14, 2017 at 1:20pm PST 
But, when he shared a screenshot of a letter addressed to Walsh from his father, we knew that even this outspoken blogger was never going to drag these two down.
My dad is a fucken SAVAGE, I can't with him ‚ù§Ô∏è pic.twitter.com/iWceEmZ6L4 
‚Äî Manny MUA (@MannyMua733) January 14, 2017 ‚ÄúI‚Äôve always been there for my son and will ALWAYS be there for him,‚Äù the note read, ‚ÄúNot only am I proud of what he has accomplished but I‚Äôm more proud of the person he has become,‚Äù says Manny‚Äôs father in the letter. A smokey eye and a nude lip is my go to! What's your go to makeup look? ü§î Eyes - top is #morphebrushes 35O palette and bottom is my palette with #MakeupGeek Lips - #urbandecay naked lip liner with #maybelline nude lust lipstick Liner - #katvondbeauty trooper eyeliner Face - #tartecosmetics shape tape concealer with #loreal total cover foundation Lashes #nubounsom bellas Brows - #anastasiabeverlyhills medium brown brow wiz Brushes used - #morphebrushes elite and gunmetal brushes! The best ! Use code MANNYMUA to save some coin on them! 
A photo posted by Manny Gutierrez (@mannymua733) on Jan 12, 2017 at 7:00pm PST 
‚ÄúI know the words you speak are from lack of knowing anybody from the LGBT community,‚Äù he continued, ‚ÄúIf you did, you would soon realize they are some of the most real and kind hearted individuals that walk this planet of ours.‚Äù
YASS! We love his supportive and kind reply and it‚Äôs a message that so many others around the world need to hear too.
